projects.title: Portfolio
projects.description: The very website you're browsing now! Rather than use plain HTML5 and CSS, I decided to use some of my favorite tools to build my own poertfolio website from scratch.

projects.title: Translator
projects.description: Powered by several IBM Cloud services, this translator achieves speedy translations of single words by generating and serving a static HTML page for the requested translation. Several languages are currently supported.

projects.title: RecipeManager
projects.description: A straight forward recipe manager. A user can create an account and log in to manage their recipes and browse other user recipes.

projects.title: Anone
projects.description: Similar to the late Yik Yak, a user can anonymously post a comment that would be visible to nearby users. Posts can also be viewed and sorted by state or simply all posts.

projects.title: Weather
projects.description: Everybody's gotta have one of these right? It's my weather app! Stay tuned for its facelift, coming soon.

projects.title: DataStructures
projects.description: More akin to notes, these are datastructures I have implemented using javascript. Includes singly and doubly linked lists, stacks, queues, BSTs, heaps, hash tables, and graphs. Photo credit => https://dev.to/
